item.title: Road markings fading on Chadd Drive, 22nd July
item.description:
The road markings particularly the car parking ones are fading away on this road and would it be possible to have them repainted. Some people are confused and can't see them properly as the markings are so old.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chadd Drive, Bickley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road has temporary traffic lights but no work being undertaken, 22nd July
item.description:
There are temporary traffic lights and part of the road cordoned off but no work has been undertaken for close to a week. This particular stretch of road is a bottleneck and so temporary traffic lights with no work is causing mayhem
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crofton Lane, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Utility Works and Temporary Traffic Lights

item.title: Childrens Toys and Cushions left outside a house, 22nd July
item.description:
The residents of number 149 Blithdale Road ( who are currently renting the property) often leave clothes, shoes, anything on the pavement outside wall of the house . The current things which were left outside was left on Sunday and today ( Wednesday) are still there.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blithdale Road, Abbey Wood, London

item.title: Decathlon - Hoblingwell pavilion, 22nd July
item.description:
A woman has just left a large pile of malodorous poo on paving outside the pavillion, near the carpark flowerbed. Please could this be removed urgently and the area sanitised?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leesons Way, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned car on capitol ring footpath, 22nd July
item.description:
This car has been abandoned on the capitol ring footpath, which cars aren’t allowed on. The MOT expired in March and it’s been here for 2 weeks. It’s still got taco documentation in the windscreen.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Spring Lane, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
